artist: Artist: Fly NYC , et al.; Author: Carissa Screems; Publisher: Carissa Screems , Philadelphia
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical text, patterns, and illustration of a pirate-hat-wearing figure and a dog, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 43 pp.
medium: Xerography, color offset lithography, pen and ink; bound volume
title: Screems from Inside #7.5 (version 2)
